channel.title: 🏢 King's College London on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 King's College London on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Stealth edits to large language models
item.description: Researchers unveil stealth edits for large language models, offering a new metric to assess editability and reveal vulnerability to malicious attacks.

item.title: Verifiably Robust Conformal Prediction
item.description: VRCP, a new framework, uses neural network verification to make conformal prediction robust against adversarial attacks, supporting various norms and regression tasks.
